Title: Being Obsessed
Plot: Eve dreams that she is on the Titanic with Sam, not suprising as Sylvie is totally obsessed with it.  She wakes up and saids she doesn't like Sam in that way.  The dreams keep happening and in the end Eve just tells Sam the truth.  The dreams finally end.  Also her father has to put up with Mitsi, his clint, who has fallen for him even if he is married and Slyvie is desperate to find a date by stealing Charlotte's love potion out of her locker that she got from the internet.
